Description: Body sherd of Attic black-figured pottery kylix; outside, youth with spear and probably shield to right, added red on body and white on shield; inside black glazed.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: van de Wiel 1968 / Verzameling ceramiek en Terracotta's Archaeologisch Instituut der Rijksuniversiteit Leiden (p. 10, N 33)
Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (p. 61, no. 18)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1455)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: T.2950 (Musée Scheurleer (The Hague) Registration number)
